name: Blog-app-python-2.7-django-
tagline: A Responsive Blog built on Python 2.7
body: # MEBLOG MEBLOG is a open-source single-user blog application built on Django 1.8.5.0 and Python 2.7.10 ## Features - login/logout - module authentication - add/edit/delete blogs - add/delete Categories - responsive Version 1
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
